login.title: Login - Tio Broker CRM
login.mainHeading: Power up your real estate business.
login.subheading: Access the complete platform to efficiently manage your clients, properties, and deals.
login.welcome: Welcome back! Please enter your details.
login.passwordResetSuccess: Password reset successfully! Please log in with your new password.

recover.title: Recover Password - Tio Broker CRM
recover.subheading: We'll help you regain access to your account quickly and securely.
recover.instructions: Enter your registered email and we will send you a link to create a new password.

confirmation.title: Link Sent - Tio Broker CRM
confirmation.subheading: The next step to recover your access is in your inbox.
confirmation.instructions: If the provided email is in our system, we will send a reset link. Please check your inbox and also your spam folder.

invalid.title: Invalid Login - Tio Broker CRM
invalid.instructions: The email or password you entered is incorrect. Please check the details and try again.

noRealty.title: Access Blocked - Tio Broker CRM
noRealty.subheading: Your access is pending one final step before you can start enjoying the platform.
noRealty.instructions1: It seems your user has not yet been linked to a real estate agency.
noRealty.instructions2: Please contact the system administrator to request access authorization.
